data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Huiqin, Pei, Sujian, Li, Yaying, Shi, Baojun (2012): Discovery of the subgenus Lithobius (Sigibius) Chamberlin, 1913 (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha: Lithobiidae) in East Asia: A review the Chinese species. Zootaxa 3348: 56-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281530
